emailTemplate.name: forum_suggestedanswer
emailTemplate.subject: $core_v2_forumReply.Current.Subject: answer suggested
emailTemplate.htmlBody:
#set($post = $core_v2_forumReply.Current)
The following post by $post.Author.DisplayName was suggested as an answer to "$post.Subject":


$email_utility.RenderHtml($post)
Did this answer your question? Verify as the answer
Not the answer to your question? Reject as the answer

Flag this reply as spam/abuse.
emailTemplate.textBody:
#set($post = $core_v2_forumReply.Current)
From: $post.Author.DisplayName Post: $email_utility.RenderText($post.Subject) Posted in: $email_utility.RenderText($core_v2_forum.Current.Name) Link: $core_v2_forumUrls.ForumReply($post.Id)
Suggested answer: $email_utility.RenderText($post)
Did this answer your question? Verify as the answer: $core_v2_forumUrls.VerifyForumThreadAnswer($post.Id) Not the answer to your question? Reject as the answer: $core_v2_forumUrls.RejectForumThreadAnswer($post.Id)
------------------------------------------------------------------ You were sent this email because you opted to receive email notifications when someone responded to this thread.
To unsubscribe from: - ...only this thread, disable notifications at $core_v2_forumUrls.ForumReply($post.Id). - ...all email notifications from $core_v2_configuration.SiteName, navigate to "Settings", click on the "Email" tab, then under the "Email configuration" section, set Send notifications to "No".
